name: Business Analyst / Аналитик бизнес-процессов
description:
ABOUT THE JOB

You will be a part of Wholesale organisation - an important contributor to the customer fulfillment chain ensuring timely availability of goods in IKEA stores and omnichannel sources in Russia for the customer at the lowest prices. This function is responsible for the full scope of actions needed to comply with the demands legislation in Russian Federation related to import of goods as well as selling the goods to retailer.

YOU WILL

  • Collect statistic data, provide its analysis for the need of department business processes development;
  • Create/update department internal reports, contribute to processes improvement and routines;
  • Analyse costs and create reports in accordance with established budget;
  • Big data analysis.

WHAT YOU WILL NEED

  • High university degree (preferably in maths, IT or physics);
  • +2 years of working experience as an Analyst or similar;
  • Advanced user of MS Excel and good SQL knowledge;
  • Analytical skills, passion to work with big data and information;
  • Ability to prioritise operational tasks and perform work within the prescribed period;
  • Experience with business analytical tools;
  • Good English knowledge both written and spoken - Intermediate and higher.

WE OFFER

  • Full compliance with Labor Law, official employment;
  • You can work remotely or from office;
  • Staff discount on IKEA goods for all co-workers;
  • Corporate medical insurance;
  • Subsidized meal;
  • Partial compensation for fitness club;
  • Partial compensation of children’s summer camps;
  • Staff parties and gifts;
  • Life insurance;
  • Corporate pension program;
  • Learning offer for professional growth;
  • Unlimited career and development opportunities at Ingka group!

мы наполняем
работу жизнью

ИКЕА надежный работодатель. Несмотря на пандемию, мы сохранили рабочие места и зарплату всем нашим сотрудникам.
На сегодняшний день мы продолжаем развивать бизнес ИКЕА и рады предложить стабильную и интересную работу с хорошим потенциалом для роста в нашей команде.

IKEA is a reliable employer. Despite the pandemic, we have saved the jobs and salaries of all our co-workers. We continue to develop IKEA business and offer a stable and interesting job with opportunities for growth in our team.
